Detailed Description

General class for Adaptive File System

bool Efs::ensureSpace (  int  blocks  )  [protected]
 

It tests fs's free space have enough size for new blocks. In case of fs does not have such space, growFS will be called. If space growth failed, returns false, true otherwise
